data.details: Look around the living room for the calendar.

results.current_world_state.location_details.liv: This appears to be a living room.

data.outcome_description: At 01:56 PM on Thursday, May 22, 2025 (Local time for New York, New York), sim_sustdj moved to Living Room (ID: living_room_01).

data.narrative: At 01:56 PM on Thursday, May 22, 2025 (Local time for New York, New York), Ava enters the living room, the space feeling slightly dim due to the cloudy weather outside. A comfortable **sofa (sofa_01)** sits against one wall, and a **coffee table (coffee_table_01)** is positioned in front of it. The **dining table (dining_table_01)**, where she'd left her lunch, is towards the back of the room. An archway to the **kitchen (kitchen_01)** is visible to her right, a reminder of her earlier foraging for leftovers. The entrance to the **hallway (hallway_01)**, is adjacent to the dining area.

discovered_objects.name: Dining Table
discovered_objects.description: A small dining table with two chairs.

discovered_connections.description: An open archway leading to the kitchen.
The entrance to a hallway, likely leading to the bathroom and other rooms.
